lead_paragraph: Henrik Lundqvist is looking forward to playing in the re-booted World Cup of Hockey but the Swedish goalie hopes the tournament does not ultimately spell the end of NHL participation in the Olympics.

headline.print_headline: Lundqvist Hopes World Cup Doesn't End NHL's Olympic Run
headline.main: Lundqvist Hopes World Cup Doesn't End NHL's Olympic Run
